thread.title: EMC Corporation Announces That David N. Strohm Has Resigned From The Board of Directors
thread.title_full: EMC Corporation Announces That David N. Strohm Has Resigned From The Board of Directors

author: admin
title: EMC Corporation Announces That David N. Strohm Has Resigned From The Board of Directors
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 1:38 PM Companies mentioned in this article: EMC Corporation 
HOPKINTON, Mass., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- EMC Corporation (NYSE: EMC) today announced that David N. Strohm resigned from the board of directors effective Tuesday, October 6, 2015. Mr. Strohm indicated that his resignation was due to increasing conflict with other business and personal obligations. 
Joseph M. Tucci, chairman and CEO of EMC said, "On behalf of the board of directors, we thank Dave for his selfless service to EMC during the past twelve years. Dave's counsel and advice to all of us has been invaluable. We wish him the very best in his future endeavors." 
About EMC EMC Corporation is a global leader in enabling businesses and service providers to transform their operations and deliver IT as a service. Fundamental to this transformation is cloud computing . Through innovative products and services, EMC accelerates the journey to cloud computing, helping IT departments to store, manage, protect and analyze their most valuable asset - information - in a more agile, trusted and cost-efficient way. Additional information about EMC can be found at www.EMC.com . 
EMC is a trademark of EMC Corporation in the United States and/or other countries. All other trademarks used are the property of their respective owners. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emc-corporation-announces-that-david-n-strohm-has-resigned-from-the-board-of-directors-300158184.html 
SOURCE EMC Corporation
